author: Paul Farhi
title: White House attacks Voice of America, claiming it promoted Chinese propaganda - The Washington Post
description: White House attacks Voice of America, claiming it promoted Chinese propaganda The Washington Post White House rips U.S.-funded outlet Voice of America in daily newsletter POLITICO Trump White House Claims 'Voice of America' Relays Propaganda For Chinese NPR N…
content: The unsigned statement said, in part: Journalists should report the facts, but VOA has instead amplified Beijings propaganda. This week, VOA called Chinas Wuhan lockdown a successful model copied by much of the worldand then tweeted out video of the Communist… [+3532 chars]
